title: This England. No. 10 [Elizabeth I and Mary, Queen of Scots, 1568]
brief_description: Using paintings, drawings and sketches, this episode tells of the year 1568 and the rivalry between Queen Elizabeth I and Mary, Queen of Scots. Covers Mary’s captivity in England and her subsequent death sentence.
